text: Sade Sealy (born 18 November 1991) is a Barbadian athlete competing in the 400 and 800 metres. She represented her country in the 400 metres at the 2013 World Championships without advancing from the first round. After switching to the 800 metres she finished fourth at the 2019 Pan American Games in a new national record of 2:02.23. ==International competitions== {| |- !colspan="6"|Representing |-
